content: Microchip Technology Inc  is planning to submit a binding offer for Atmel Corp  by early next week  according to people familiar with the matter  challenging Atmel's planned merger with Dialog Semiconductor Plc .
name: Microchip Technology Incorporated
title: Microchip prepares binding offer for Atmel: sources

content: Jan 4 Microchip Technology Inc is planning to submit a binding offer for Atmel Corp by early next week  according to people familiar with the matter  challenging Atmel's planned merger with Dialog Semiconductor Plc .
name: Microchip Technology Incorporated
title: Microchip prepares binding offer for Atmel -sources

content: Microchip Technology Inc  is the semiconductor manufacturer which made the $3.8 billion unsolicited offer for peer Atmel Corp  that was disclosed last week  a person familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.
name: Microchip Technology Incorporated
title: Exclusive: Microchip is undisclosed Atmel bidder challenging Dialog - source
